itemDescription: Scottish footballer (1869-1930), played in the Football League for Aston Villa

wikipedia_page.main: George Russell (August 1869 – 1930) was a Scottish footballer who played in the Football League for Aston Villa with whom he played in and won the 1895 FA Cup Final.

response: * George Russell (composer) (1923–2009), American jazz composer and theorist

* George Russell (racing driver) (born 1998), British racing driver
